title: Loading screen/Queue problems and bugs
body:
Just had a problem where first I waited for an ARAM game for like 7 to 10 minutes after what I got x3 times "Connect/Retry" pop-up window and then eventually even supposed DirectX problem even though I have latest drivers installed.

https://i.imgur.com/UxfsA30.jpg

The same problem was reported by other players in the same ARAM game which btw we played at first 4vs3.. and then 4vs4. Two players never managed to connect

I am not playing today anymore to avoid further issues with this type of bug

replies.body: Issue should be resolved within 30 minutes (if not already).  Let me know if the issue persists.
agreed. league is not playable at all as of today.
